column3: ## Reject application that is a continuation
login as ProfessorFrostfire (you may want to log in using an incognito window)
open "Advances in Cold Lava Mechanics" application (available on your dashboard)
change the status to "Rejected" in the "Change status" input

column4: application is saved
a warning appears with information about an older journal and a link in "focus" mode
the form is dimmed; interactions outside the warning are blocked
the "Got it!" button is displayed at the bottom

column3: click the link in the warning

column4: the "Annals of Cryovolcanic Ecology" form opens in a new tab

column3: Unlock & Close the journal form, close the tab, and return to the application form

column4: the warning is now in standard mode
the "Got it!" button is hidden
the application is active and can be unlocked & closed

column3: open the application again (navigate to `/admin/application/<application_id>` or search for "Advances in Cold Lava Mechanics" in `/admin/applications`)

column4: the warning about the older journal is displayed at the top
the application is active and editable
it can be unlocked & closed

column3: change the status back to "In progress" and save (do not close)

column4: the warning disappears

column3: once saved, click the "Quick Reject" button
choose any rejection reason and click "Quick Reject"

column4: application is saved
the warning appears again at the top
the form is dimmed; interactions outside the warning are blocked
the warning returns to standard mode
the application is active and editable
it can be unlocked & closed

column3: change any information (except status) and save

column4: the application is saved correctly
the warning remains in standard mode
